subject: Re: Order #SSN4986, how did it go?
description_text:
Hello, I've completed all the reviews.

I have a question: when I placed my order, I accidentally placed several
orders. I was too quick to finalize and forgot the accessories.
As a result, I paid shipping costs multiple times.
Since I received only one package containing all three orders, will you
refund part of these shipping costs?
Thank you

Le mer. 7 janv. 2026 à 15:25, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> a écrit :

> Hello Pascal, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel.
> Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes
> a few
> seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi Pascal Gregoire,     Thank you for your feedback. We have refunded a portion of your shipping costs. Please check your account.
